Text.Page:
Thulsa's manipulated the wendigos and turned them against us. We've no choice but to kill them to secure our hold on the Vale of Spires.

Kill the dominated wendigo {@LinkCreature:51#1011#ragers}, {@LinkCreature:51#1021#warlords}, and {@LinkCreature:51#1031#shamans}.

Report to Thenuvia at Icebase Defiance when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
